name: Avoid SQL using HAVING (PeopleSoft)
description: This rule searches for all HAVING clause inside PeopleSoft SQL Definitions.
rationale:
Rules of construction of query to improve performances.
A 'having' clause is just like a where clause, but processed after an aggregation step.
If GROUP BY is not there, an implicit single aggregated group in built, with a cost in performance.
remediation:
Review the design of the query to avoid if possible HAVING clause.
If GROUP BY is not there, prefer using a WHERE clause instead of HAVING.

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
